tool_description: Calculates hydraulic conductivity from constant head, falling head, and flexible wall permeameter test data.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs with permeability test data

test_method.description: Test method: constant_head, falling_head, or flexible_wall

water_temperature.description: Water temperature during test in Celsius

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more samples do not have permeability test data.
Unsupported test method: Use one of [constant_head, falling_head, flexible_wall].
Invalid water temperature: Must be between 5 and 40 degrees Celsius.
Incomplete test data: Samples must have all required measurements for the specified test method.
usage: Specify sample_ids, test_method, and water_temperature to calculate hydraulic conductivity values with temperature corrections.

permeability_classification.description: Permeability classification (high, medium, low, very low)
